issues.description: The problem statement specifies that the `birthday` attribute is stored as an ISO-8601 formatted String, but both the template and solution define `birthday` as a `LocalDate`. This mismatch can confuse students about the expected field type and how to handle dates in the entity.
issues.suggested_fix: Revise the problem statement to indicate that `birthday` is represented as a `LocalDate` (and note that JSON serialization will produce an ISO-8601 string), ensuring consistency with the provided code.
